ygData.msgSnippet: yes you pay for more than one account makes transfers easier if your home has more than 0ne computer......ours has 3+ ... From: D M
ygData.messageBody:
yes you pay for more than one account makes transfers easier if your home
has more than 0ne computer......ours has 3+
